summary: The U.S. is facing a public health crisis as street drugs are rapidly changing. Quickly detecting and identifying new drugs could save lives. Current analysis methods and technologies can often detect and identify new drugs. And, from FY 2019-2024, about $12.5 million in federal grants were awarded to develop new methods and technologies. But other challenges make it hard for law enforcement and public health...
title: Street Drug Analysis: Factors Affecting the Detection and Identification of Emerging Substances
